# Minimal Markdown Example

This is a simple, minimal example of R Markdown. R


```{r}

library(ggplot)

data(mtcars)

```

```{r}

print(mtcars)

```


```{r}

table(mtcars$cyl)

```

```{r}

hist( mtcars$disp)

```

```{r}

hist(mtcars$mpg, )

```

```{r}

plot( mtcars$cyl, mtcars$mpg)

```

```{r}

plot( mtcars$disp, mtcars$mpg)

```
